summary: Allows you to disenchant items from the Shrouded Armor set
descriptionHtml:
Update 1.03 By request I Added Muffle Enchantment.esp that allows you to disenchant the Shrouded Boots, and the Shrouded Shoes to gain the Muffle enchantment.

Update 1.02: This mod is now working on it\'s own.

This mod allows you to learn the Backstab enchantment, and the Muffle enchantment from disenchanting peises from the Dark Brotherhood armor \"Shrouded Armor set\".
 
The Backstab enchantment works only with gloves, boots, bracers, rings, and amulets. 

Usage: 
For the Backstab enchantment you will need a pair of the \"Shrouded Hand Wraps\" that is part of the Dark Brotherhood armor set \"Shrouded Armor\". If you are not in the Dark Brotherhood you can use the console  command \"player.additem 000CF8A9 1\".

For the Muffle enchantment you will need either one of the Shrouded Boots, or Shoes
player.additem 000d2845 1 (For the boots)
player.additem 000cf89f 1 (For the shoes)

Installation:
Just drag and drop to your Skyrim data folder usually fond in C:\\ProgramFiles\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim. And activate the mod using your favorite mod manager.
Enjoy :)

Recommended Mods:
 \"I Put A Spell On You - More Enchanting Options\" mod by fireundubh  http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3313
Allows you to learn many of the locked enchantments found on various items.
author: 680i ba1
